A true work of art, this purse is like a beautiful dream, with vibrant colors. Even the metal parts are superbly  designed in an artful filigree. It's a steal at the price it's being sold. It deserves much more.

I have really gotten into sparkly purses recently.  I purchased this to dress up for an event with a peacock theme (coordinated dress and earrings to the purse) and have used it as an every day purse several times since.  Everyone who sees it LOVES it.  Although the chain is thin it doesn’t dig into my shoulder even full of my phone and wallet and it can be removed if you would like to use it as a clutch and the metal tabs that hold the chain fold down into the purse and disappear.  I prefer to use it as a crossbody purse, but it’s great.  Glad I bought this.

Bought for a wedding in 2022, only used at the wedding (first & only use).  Sequins/beads came off by the end of the evening & all I did was carry it to my table where it stayed on the table & 2 times took it to rest room.  It's very pretty, but will not remain so if the beads keep falling off.
This clutch was so cute in person! It went well with my bikini and fan I wore to the Bahamas. Stop procrastinating and buy it!

This clutch is a dramatic display of blue & green sparkle, and is a perfect size for a cell phone, lip stick, small wallet, etc.  Arrived over 1 week earlier than expected and comes with 2 different length chain straps.  I like to wear mine cross body so I added some chain links from the short strap to the long strap and it is perfect!  I ordered this purse to go with my get up for a gatsby style party, but it is a fun purse to use on an every-day occasion.

I found this adorable little handbag when I was searching to buy a blue beaded bag and I couldn't resist it.  I needed something fancy to carry to a wedding last weekend and I love this.  I got quite a few compliments on it, and I'm so glad I didn't get a plain bag for the occasion.  This is a small purse and is just the right size to carry my phone, keys, license & credit cards and lipstick.  It is made well, opens easily and stays tightly closed.  It has a nice satin lining.  It came with 2 separate chain link straps. I used the shorter one to carry it to the wedding, but it's so cute that I'm going to carry it using the longer strap as a shoulder bag for a little extra pizzazz when going out and about.  I am very happy I purchased this bag because I will use it much more often than a plain beaded bag to use just for weddings or fancy parties.  I can recommend this one.
